description: AI-powered command-line workflow tool adapted from Google's Gemini CLI and optimized for Qwen3-Coder models
main_purpose: Enhance developer workflows with intelligent code assistance
key_capabilities: Code understanding and editing beyond context window limits
Workflow automation for PR handling and complex operations
Interactive CLI with rich terminal experience
Tool integration for file operations, shell commands, and web fetching

advantages: More mature UI/UX with themes and vim mode
disadvantages: Less advanced reasoning compared to Claude models

feasibility_assessment.reasoning: Mature codebase with existing GitHub Action, well-documented, secure sandbox features, and cost-effective compared to Claude API
feasibility_assessment.readiness: Ready for implementation with existing foundation
